CREATE_CLIENT.TITLE: Create OIDC Client
CREATE_CLIENT.DESCRIPTION: Register a new application that can authenticate with the realm.

FIELDS.CLIENT_ID_HELPER_TEXT: The unique identifier for your application. Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.
FIELDS.VALID_REDIRECT_URIS_HELPER_TEXT: After login, ReAuth can only redirect users to these specific URLs.

VALIDATIONS.CLIENT_ID_MIN_THREE_CHARS: Client ID must be at least 3 characters
VALIDATIONS.CLIENT_ID_REGEX: Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens allowed
VALIDATIONS.VALID_REDIRECT_URI_MIN_COUNT: At least one redirect URI is required
